Begin Mini-Page 20237

Begin Mini-Page 20238
Membership Offerings
End Mini-Page 20238
Begin Mini-Page 20239
Golf Only Memberships
Membership Initiation Fee: $100,000 Non-Refundable
This is golfing at its best at a true golf club.  The Golf Only membership offers full access to the golf club facilities with priority privileges for tee times, tournaments, events, seminars, and practice facilities.  LaPlaya Golf Club has a reputation for fast pace of play, ten minute tee times and you can always get a game.  Our members are varied in age groups and join us from various upscale communities in the Naples area providing great camaraderie throughout our membership for men and women.  Our golf staff will welcome you with warm enthusiasm and a relaxed atmosphere; a truly unique club.  The Grill Room boasts a terrific lunch menu and the bar is open late!  The golf club is the winner of several Conde Nast Traveler Awards!
·
There are no food and beverage minimums
·
Members not subject to either operating or capital assessments
·
Immediate family privileges; Extended family privileges
·
Entertain family and friends at the Golf Club
·
Centrally located in North Naples
·
Our membership cap is 300
Privileges at the golf club
Members will enjoy all of the amenities of the Golf Club including:
·
Low annual dues of $12,834.26 including tax
·
Exclusive tee times from 7:30 a.m.-10:30 a.m. in high season and priority tee times after 10:30 a.m.
·
Unlimited access to the Golf Club facilities and amenities including Golf Shop and Grille Room
·
10 day (on-line) advance tee time reservation
·
Pay cart fee only
/ no greens fee
·
Full play in all tournaments and events and priority sign up when field size is limited
·
Unlimited use of practice facility
·
Exclusive use of the Member Locker Rooms
·
Golf bag storage and locker rental available
·
Friends and family guest privileges
·
Sponsor a limited number of unaccompanied guests at preferred pricing
·
Lessons and clinics available through our Golf Professionals
·
Enjoy Member receptions and other Golf Club social events throughout the year
·
Enjoy Reciprocal off-season play and dining at other featured Naples county clubs
privileges available at the beach club and resort
·
Reciprocal dining at the exclusive LaPlaya Private Beach Dining Club off season from May through October (no beach privileges)
·
Preferred pricing in Baleen Restaurant at LaPlaya Resort
·
Preferred pricing at the private Spa Terre from May through October
·
Preferred pricing at LaPlaya Boutique
·
Preferred pricing on LaPlaya guest rooms
·
Preferred pricing on other Noble House Hotels and Resorts throughout the United States
End Mini-Page 20239

Begin Mini-Page 20069
About LaPlaya Golf Club
End Mini-Page 20069
Begin Mini-Page 20070
http://https//www.youtube.com/watch?v=qsfGNGrGAp4
LaPlaya Clubhouse
from
Naples Drone Photography
on
Vimeo
.
LaPlaya Golf Club opened in January 2002 as a totally new 18-hole championship course lay out, artfully designed by Bob Cupp. The course is a 6,902 yard, par 72 golf course with five sets of tees to meet every golfer’s ability.
“LaPlaya definitely has a natural look, with lots of indigenous landscaping, rolling fairways and water features added to make it not only fun and challenging to play, but also pleasing to the eye.”
-Bob Cupp
A world class designer, Bob Cupp, has designed courses that have hosted more than 50 national and international tournaments, including seven major championships. Since launching Cupp Design, Inc. in 1986, Cupp has designed more than 100 courses, including acclaimed works as Beacon Hill near Toronto; Pumpkin Ridge in Portland, Oregon; Old Waverly at West Point, Mississippi and locally The Estuary at Grey Oaks and Grey Oaks Golf Clubs here in Naples. For 15 years prior to establishing his own design firm, Cupp was a senior designer for Jack Nicklaus, designing courses around the globe.
Golf Club Events
Our expert staff members work closely each year to plan a full calendar of tournaments and events with the guarantee that members will enjoy every outing.
With the congenial camaraderie at LaPlaya, an atypical Southwest Florida golf course with rolling fairways, and a staff completely at your service, don't miss out playing great golf this year.  We invite you to become a member of LaPlaya Golf Club!
We plan events that can be an excellent way to play with other members, treat friends or business colleagues to a great day of fun and competition. Our golf course employees cater to our members and provide them with the greatest level of customer service making every event feel exclusive.
Lessons
LaPlaya Golf Club is staffed by a team of on-site top PGA & LPGA teaching professionals.
Our staff offers a wide range of expert tutelage and guidance of the highest quality, distinguished by their individual teaching styles. Our professionals offer golf lessons including individual, digital video, juniors, clinics, and playing lessons. Ben Bryant, Laurel Kean, and Evan Bowser will help you to become a better golfer.  Contact the Golf Shop at (239) 254-5001.
Golf Course Information
LaPlaya Golf Course –2016 Silver Medal Award Winner for Resort Golf Courses, Golf Magazine
6902 yards from the Tournament tees (6385 yards from the LaPlaya tees)
73.7/139 Course Rating and Slope from the Tournament Tees (71.0/133 from the LaPlaya Tees)
5 sets of tee boxes
155 acres for the entire property
100 acres turf, 30 acres landscape, 17 acres lakes and 8 acres hard-scape
Tif-Eagle greens, Tif-Grande collars, 419 Bermuda-grass tees, fairways and roughs
7 acre practice tee area
North End of the Practice Facility houses the short game practice area with seven target greens and a putting green
South End of the Practice Facility houses the main warm-up area, and a chipping and bunker practice area
One substantially sized 10,000 square foot practice putting green located near the first tee
Oak, Black Olive, Shady Lady, Ficus, Strangler Fig, Royal Poinciana, Black Pine, Slash Pine, Tabebuia, Cassia, Sea Grape, Mahogany Trees; also are Sabal, Royal, Queen, Washingtonia
Reclinata and Areca Palms
40 other varieties of diverse Florida landscape plants throughout entire course
Other reasons the LaPlaya Golf Club is so popular:
A true golf club
Popular for pace of play
Low annual dues
Clubhouse, Grill Room and Golf Shop
Exceptional practice facilities
A course unlike the rest in the area with undulating fairways
No assessments
No food and beverage minimums
Practice Facilities
LaPlaya’s practice facilities are ideal for a pre-round loosening up and for members interested in working on their fundamentals and sharpening their short-game skills. The club features an impeccable full-length driving range, target short game practice facility, putting green and practice bunker.
End Mini-Page 20070
